Frequently Asked Questions regarding an Abandoned Vehicle

Reporting an abandoned vehicle

If you would like to report a vehicle, please complete the online form link to online form.

Reporting an untaxed vehicle

If you wish to report an untaxed vehicle please contact us using the details above.

Retrieving an abandoned vehicle

If your vehicle has been removed by enter council name you can arrange to retrieve it by completing the on-line form link to online form. On receipt of the form we will advise you of the costs involved and issue a release note.
